```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

#### Exercise 1
```{r}
#a)
census_api_key("2153faf1e1d25707ef71c8c464cb4c2c08be4e76")
install = TRUE

year00 <- get_decennial(geography = "state", 
                       variables = "P013001", 
                       year = 2000)
year00

#b)
mean(year00$value)
median(year00$value)
min(year00$value)
quantile(year00$value, 0.25)
quantile(year00$value, 0.75)
```

#### Exercise 2
```{r}
#a)
year10 <- get_decennial(geography = "state", 
                       variables = "P013H002", 
                       year = 2010)
year10

#b)
mean(year10$value)
median(year10$value)
min(year10$value)
quantile(year10$value, 0.25)
quantile(year10$value, 0.75)

#c)
 m25 <- year10 %>% select(NAME | value) %>%
   filter(value < 25)
 
m25

```
